column3: I am I plus my circumstances.
I don't believe people are looking for the meaning of life as much as they are looking for the experience of being alive.
Life itself is the proper binge.
True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
My life is my message.
Only an artist can interpret the meaning of life.
The most satisfying thing in life is to have been able to give a large part of one's self to others.
To be free is to have achieved your life.
Life is a moderately good play with a badly written third act.
You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.
No man is a failure who is enjoying life.
Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
We can't plan life. All we can do is be available for it.
With renunciation life begins.
Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.

Each one of us decides to incarnate upon this planet at a particular point in time and space. We have chosen to come here to learn a particular lesson that will advance us upon our spiritual, evolutionary pathway.
Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.

The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of evry part of your life.

In some parts of the world, students are going to school every day. It's their normal life. But in other part of the world, we are starving for education... it's like a precious gift. It's like a diamond.
My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
Music is the emotional life of most people.

I think the most important thing in life is self-love, because if you don't have self-love, and respect for everything about your own body, your own soul, your own capsule, then how can you have an authentic relationship with anyone else?

If I could give you information of my life, it would be to show how a woman of very ordinary ability has been led by God in strange and unaccustomed paths to do In His service what He has done in her. And if I could tell you all, you would see how God has done all, and I nothing.

As you keep your mind and heart focused in the right direction, approaching each day with faith and gratitude, I believe you will be empowered to live life to the fullest and enjoy the abundant life He has promised you!
Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
